steps.text:
Case records of the Massachusetts General Hospital. Case 2-2013. A 20-year-old 
man with recurrent ear pain, fever, and headache.
Stankovic KM(1), Eskandar E, El Khoury JB, Lev MH, Sadow PM.

Author information:
(1)Department of Otolaryngology, Massachusetts Eye and Ear Infirmary, Boston, 
USA.
